alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 1:56PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Horry County through 230 PM EDT... At 155 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wampee, or near North Myrtle Beach, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... North Myrtle Beach, Little River, North Myrtle Beach Airport, Wampee, Longs, Hammond, Brooksville, Hand, Barefoot Landing Area Of North Myrtle Beach, Briarcliffe Acres, Atlantic Beach and Sea Coast Medical Center. This includes the following highways... SC Highway 31 between mile markers 14 and 24. SC Highway 22 between mile markers 14 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
